data.feedback: Architecture is sound, all file paths verified, stories well-structured. Minor semantic issue in API endpoints can be corrected during implementation.

issues.description: Story 5 api_endpoints.dart uses wrong endpoints (/study-plans, /lessons) instead of actual backend routes (/steps, /sharing, /goals)
issues.recommendation: Developer should read backend routes/index.ts and use actual endpoints: /auth/*, /steps/*, /sharing/*, /goals/*

suggestions: Add explicit instruction in Story 5 to read backend/src/routes/index.ts for endpoint discovery
Consider adding .env to pubspec.yaml assets section in Story 1 (required for flutter_dotenv)
